creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: wine ewer dragon handle and spout, the body formed of a pomegranate shape, a peach and a Buddha-hand citron fruit; porcelain with Ying Ching bluish glaze and brown glaze, copper-red underglaze; Yuan-Ming dynasty porcelain copy
title: Wine Ewer
